p: African green monkey cells (Vero cells; Cat. No. CCL81, ATCC) were cultured with Dulbecco’s minimum essential medium (HyClone, Pittsburgh, PA, USA) supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (Gibco, Waltham, MA, USA). The viruses used in this study were the attenuated strain YN144 ( Accession No. KT021232, [ 38]) and the prototype strain CV777 [ 39]. Notably, 5 μg/mL trypsin was added to the medium during culture of the YN144 virus.
